title: 1. Introduction
content: Welcome to Cephie Snap. By using our service, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree, please do not use Cephie Snap.

title: Important
content: All images you upload are publicly accessible. Don't share anything you wouldn't want to be public.

title: 2. Usage
content: Cephie Snap allows you to upload and share images. You are responsible for the content you upload. You must not upload, share, or distribute any images that are illegal, NSFW, offensive, or violate copyright or intellectual property rights.

title: 3. Account
content: You must sign in using Clerk to use certain features. You are responsible for maintaining the security of your account.

title: 4. Prohibited Content
content: Uploading or sharing prohibited content (including but not limited to NSFW, violent, hateful, or illegal material) will result in immediate account suspension or ban. We reserve the right to remove any content and ban users at our discretion.

title: 5. Limitation of Liability
content: Cephie Snap is provided "as is" without warranties. We are not liable for any damages, losses, or claims arising from your use of the service.

title: 6. Changes
content: We may update these Terms at any time. Continued use of Cephie Snap means you accept any changes.

title: 7. Data Collection (Privacy)
content: Cephie Snap values your privacy. We collect and use data as follows:

subsections.title: Authentication
subsections.content: We use Clerk for authentication. Clerk may collect your email, name, and other profile information. See Clerk's own privacy policy for details.

subsections.title: Uploads
subsections.content: When you upload images, we store the image URLs and timestamps linked to your Clerk user ID.

subsections.title: API Logs
subsections.content: API calls are logged (API key, route, method, timestamp, and outcome) for security and analytics.

title: 8. Use of Data
content: Your images and account info are used only to provide Cephie Snap services. We do not sell or share your data with third parties except as required by law.

title: 9. Cookies
content: We use cookies for authentication (via Clerk) and to improve user experience. See our Cookies Policy for details.

title: 10. Your Rights
content: You can request deletion of your images at any time. For account data managed by Clerk, please refer to Clerk's privacy controls.

title: 11. Cookies Policy
content: Cephie Snap uses cookies to provide and improve our service.

subsections.title: What Are Cookies?
subsections.content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device. They help us remember your preferences and keep you signed in.

subsections.title: How We Use Cookies
subsections.content: Authentication: Clerk uses cookies to manage your login session. Preferences: We may use cookies to remember your theme (dark/light mode) and other settings.

subsections.title: Third-Party Cookies
subsections.content: Clerk may set cookies for authentication. Please refer to Clerk's documentation for details.

subsections.title: Managing Cookies
subsections.content: You can control cookies in your browser settings. Disabling cookies may affect your ability to use Cephie Snap.

title: 12. Policy Changes
content: We may update our privacy and cookie policies. Continued use means you accept any changes.
